Title: Gen-X Cops
Writer: Benny Chan, Koan Hui, Yee-Wah Lee, Bey Logan (English dialogue), Peter Tsi (screenplay)
Actors: Nicholas Tse, Stephen Fung, Sam Lee, Grace Yip
Plot: The "Generation X Cops" are four young officers of the Hong Kong Police, joined together to fight against organised crime using all possible means, even if this would lead them to break the law... Their first assignement: eliminate a gang of criminals who have stolen a shipload of explosives.
